data.title: About: Han Sun-hwa
data.meta_description: Han Sun-hwa (born October 6, 1990), also known mononymously as Sunhwa, is a South Korean singer and actress. She is a former member of the South Korean girl group Secret. She made her television debut in 2004 while participating in SBS' Superstar Survival as a finalist, and in 2009, she was a regular cast on a variety show called Invincible Youth. Aside from music, she also ventured into acting and made her debut in the 2010 drama, More Charming By The Day. She also acted in several dramas with supporting roles in Ad Genius Lee Tae-baek, God's Gift - 14 Days, and Marriage, Not Dating.
data.text:
dbo:abstract

هان سن هوا (مواليد 6 أكتوبر 1990) مغنية وممثلة كورية جنوبية. هي عضوة سابقة في فرقة الفتيات الكورية الجنوبية سيكرت . ظهرت لأول مرة على التلفزيون في عام 2004 أثناء مشاركتها في برنامج Superstar Survival على قناة سي بي سي ، وفي عام 2009 ، كانت مشاركة في برنامج متنوع يسمى . بصرف النظر عن الموسيقى ، غامرت أيضًا بالتمثيل وظهرت لأول مرة في دراما 2010 ، More Charming By The Day . مثلت أيضًا في العديد من الأعمال الدرامية مع أدوار داعمة في Ad Genius Lee Tae-baek ، ، و . (ar)

Han Sun-hwa (hangul: 한선화; Busan, 6 de octubre de 1990)​ es una cantante, bailarina y actriz surcoreana.​ Es una exintegrante del grupo femenino Secret. (es)

Han Sun-hwa (born October 6, 1990), also known mononymously as Sunhwa, is a South Korean singer and actress. She is a former member of the South Korean girl group Secret. She made her television debut in 2004 while participating in SBS' Superstar Survival as a finalist, and in 2009, she was a regular cast on a variety show called Invincible Youth. Aside from music, she also ventured into acting and made her debut in the 2010 drama, More Charming By The Day. She also acted in several dramas with supporting roles in Ad Genius Lee Tae-baek, God's Gift - 14 Days, and Marriage, Not Dating. (en)

Han Sun-hwa (Hangul: 한선화; Hanja: 韓善伙); lahir 6 Oktober 1990), adalah penyanyi, penari, aktris dan model Korea Selatan. Ia dikenal sebagai anggota girlband Secret. Dia melakukan debut di televisi pada 2004 berpartisipasi di SBS "Superstar Survival" sebagai finalis. Pada 2009, ia menjadi pemain tetap di acara varietas "Invincible Youth". Bersama Jun Hyoseong, Jung Hana dan Song Jieun, Sun-hwa debut sebagai anggota girlband Secret pada Oktober 2009. CNN International Seoul memasukkan Sun-hwa dalam daftar satu dari 9 artis "multi-tasking". (in)

ハン・ソナ (朝: 한선화、英: Han Sun-hwa、中: 韓善伙、1990年10月6日 - )は、韓国・釜山直轄市(現･釜山広域市)出身の歌手。アイドルグループSecretの元メンバー。 (ja)

한선화(1990년 10월 6일 ~ )는 대한민국의 배우, 전직 가수이다. 2009년 걸 그룹 시크릿의 멤버로서 연예게 데뷔했으며, 2021년 팀 해체시까지 가수로 활동한 이후 배우로 전업했다. (ko)

Han Sun-hwa (한선화?; Pusan, 6 ottobre 1990) è una cantante, ballerina e attrice sudcoreana, membro del gruppo musicale Secret. (it)

Han Sunhwa (Hangul: 한선화; nascida em 6 de outubro de 1990) mais conhecida como Sunhwa (em coreano: 선화), é uma cantora, dançarina, atriz e modelo sul-coreana. Tornou-se popular ao fazer parte do popular girl group sul-coreano Secret, onde permaneceu até 26 de setembro de 2016. Ela fez a sua estreia na televisão em 2004, durante a sua participação no "Superstar Survival" da SBS, onde foi finalista. Em 2009, ela fez um avanço na sua carreira, integrando o elenco regular de um show de variedades chamado "". Juntamente com Jun Hyoseong, Jung Hana e Song Jieun, Sunhwa estreou no Secret em outubro de 2009. A CNN International Seoul listou Sunhwa como uma das 9 estrelas em crescimento do entretenimento coreano, citando-a como uma artista "multi-tarefa". (pt)

Han Sun-hwa (hangul: 한선화), även känd under artistnamnet Sunhwa, född 6 oktober 1990 i Busan, är en sydkoreansk sångerska och skådespelare. Hon var tidigare medlem i den sydkoreanska tjejgruppen Secret från gruppens debut 2009 till att hon lämnade 2016. Som skådespelare har hon haft huvudroller i ett flertal TV-draman. Hennes yngre bror Han Seung-woo är medlem i pojkbandet Victon. (sv)

韓善伙（韓語：한선화 ，1990年10月6日－）是韓國女歌手、女演員。2005年晉身SBS選秀節目《Superstar Survival》決賽在電視出道。2009年加入由經紀公司TS娛樂組成的女子流行音樂團體Secret。2016年10月13日與TS娛樂结束合约关系退出Secret。2016年10月17日與Huayibrothers娛樂簽約，專注當演員。與Play M娛樂旗下男團VICTON的韓勝宇是親姊弟。 (zh)

dbp:quote

"I have somewhat of a wacky and laid back personality, and especially when I'm on set, I think I naturally become the "White Paper" character. Even when we were filming, the wrong answer tended to come to mind first. Of course there were times when I did it just for fun." (en)
